customResponseBodyKey.description: References the response body that you want AWS WAF to return to the web request client. This must reference a `key` defined in a `custom_response_body` block of this resource.

responseCode.description: The HTTP status code to return to the client.

responseHeaders.description: The `response_header` blocks used to define the HTTP response headers added to the response. See `response_header` below for details.
